metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0367 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - untriaged
metadata.Description:
Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 contains an unsafe use of temporarydirectory, where having LocalisationCache directory default to system tmpdirectory is insecure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0367` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-3').
